item.title: About
item.description:
devashish.me https://devashish.me/about/ -

I am a seasoned technology leader with 15+ years of experience scaling engineering organizations, driving product innovation, and aligning technology strategies with business goals. Having worked with four early-stage startups, including two successful exits, I’ve honed my expertise in building enterprise and consumer products from the ground up.

My journey has been defined by leading distributed teams to deliver secure, scalable, and high-growth products. With a primary focus on designing iterative application architectures, I specialize in creating solutions that maximize value and enable organizations to deploy code faster through automation-first approach. These processes have not only optimized developer productivity but have also fostered team learning and cross-functional collaboration.

When not working, I enjoy cooking, reading, hiking, running, and riding my motorcycle.

item.title: Initial Commit
item.description:
devashish.me https://devashish.me/posts/initial_commit/ -

For the V4 version of this blog, I’ve decided to remove all the old entries and start from scratch. With one significant change though: posting tech content only.

Over time I’ve lost interest in writing travel blogs and inflicting my unfiltered thoughts on public forums. At the same time, I’d started documenting my experiences and learnings at work, conversations with other people in industry and takeaways from reading up on the topics that excite me.

I (re)started this blog with a few objectives

  • Document my journey in building tech solutions
  • Keep notes about interesting concepts, their implementations and other aspects
  • Have discussion(s) about the “right” way to solve problems

To new beginnings!
